constraints.name: coverage
constraints.description: 时间区间 [M, E] 必须被完全覆盖（覆盖约束）

constraints.name: interval_overlap
constraints.description: 每个工作时间段 [T1, T2] 必须在 [M, E] 内（区间重叠约束）

constraints.name: cost_minimization
constraints.description: 选择的奶牛总费用最小化（成本最小化约束）
constraints.formal: minimize(∑ S[i]) where i is in the selected set of cows
